3.1
5ED4 - 07A4 = 5730

3.3
5ED4 = 0101 1110 1101 0100

3.20
0 X 0C000000 = 12*16^6 = 201326592

3.22
0 X 0C000000 =
0 | 00011000 | 000000000000000000000000 = (-1)^0 * (1 + 0)*2^(24-127) =
(-1)^0 * (1 + 0)*2^(-103)

3.23
63,25 = 1111 11.01 => 1.111 1101 * 2^5
Potens = 5+127 = 132 = 100 0010 0
Mantese = 111 1101 0000 0000 0000 0000
0 | 100 0010 0 | 111 1101 0000 0000 0000 0000

3.24
Potens = 5+1023 = 1028 = 100 0000 0100
Mantese = 1111 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
0 | 100 0000 0100 | 1111 1010 0000 0000 0000

âˆ’1.5625 Ã— 10^(-1) = -0.15625 =

= -0.00101 = -1.01*2^(-3)
Potens = -3 + 15 = 12
